Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.view.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.client.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpponentDisconnectionObserver, SocketObserver, BuilderBuiltObserver, BuilderMovementObserver, BuilderPossibleBuildObserver, BuilderPossibleMoveObserver, BuildersPlacedObserver, ChosenStepObserver, ColorAssignmentObserver, EndGameObserver, ErrorsObserver, GodChoiceObserver, PlayerAddedObserver, PlayerLoseObserver, PlayerTurnObserver, StartPlayerSetObserver, StateObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, Gui
public abstract class View
extends ViewObservable
implements BuilderPossibleMoveObserver, BuilderPossibleBuildObserver, ColorAssignmentObserver, ErrorsObserver, BuildersPlacedObserver, PlayerLoseObserver, EndGameObserver, BuilderBuiltObserver, BuilderMovementObserver, GodChoiceObserver, PlayerAddedObserver, PlayerTurnObserver, StateObserver, ChosenStepObserver, StartPlayerSetObserver, SocketObserver, OpponentDisconnectionObserver
Abstract Class implemented by UI.

    • onBuilderBuild

      public void onBuilderBuild​(java.lang.String nickname, Coordinates src, Coordinates dst, boolean dome, boolean result)
      Updates GameMap object after a Build event if the result is true
      Specified by:
      onBuilderBuild in interface BuilderBuiltObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - player who played
      src - position of the builder who built
      dst - where the builder built
      dome - true if the builder built a Dome
      result - true if the server accepted it

    • onDisconnection

      public void onDisconnection()
      called when network handler socket is disconnected from server. It changes the View state back to CONNECTION and reinitialize in-game data. It however does not reset the Map so you will have to create a new GameMap object or clean it.
      Specified by:
      onDisconnection in interface SocketObserver
